page.title: 03THE ROSEBERYS
page.content: The{Earls of Roseberys}have as long and colourful a history as their house. Sir Archibald Primrose was a lawyer and Lord Clerk Register of Scotland under Charles II.To the end of the 18th century the Roseberys lived in Barnbougle but the 3rd and 4th Earls undertook the building of Dalmeny House.The 3rd Earl was bald but vain.He even went to the lengths of going to Edinburgh wearing a long wig and returning wearing a short wig as if he had had a haircut! The{5th Earl}declared whilst still at Eton that he wished to marry a Rothschild,win the Derby and become Prime Minister.He achieved all his ambitions as he married Hannah, sole daughter and heiress of{Baron Mayer {Anschel de Rothschild,}was Prime Minister between 1894/5 and won the Derby on three occasions.(next page)
